\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 99730}

\subsection*{Staving Off Opioid Hell}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Rattlehead}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 2 mg & sublingual & Pharms - Buprenorphine & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 135.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
It was a bit of a chilly morning here at my home, I decided to take the last of bupenorphine (subutex,suboxone) I had, which included a 2mg strip that dissolves under my tongue. 



From my research, 2mg of bupenorphine is equal to 10mg of morphine. An hour or so after ingesting I prepared my self for the itchy, nicotine craved day I had ahead of me. 



Bupenorphine gives me energy, warmth, enlightenment, itchy skin, and makes me crave nicotine. All I can say is if I am gonna run out of opiates and be sick, I get my hands on some buprenorphine if I can. It has a `ceiling effect' but gives me a good buzz for about 4-8 hours.

\end{document}
